articles.title: Whanganui's Geordie Beamish stuns American's early celebrations to win mile in Oregon - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Craig Engels was waving to the crowd with victory in sight - he did not see the flying Kiwi coming up behind him
articles.content:
New Zealand middle distance runner Geordie Beamish made a mockery of American Craig Engels early celebrations to claim the international mile race at the Prefontaine Classic meeting in Oregon.
